about_the_game:
*This game is still early in development. The following details are susceptible to significant change.*

WELCOME TO HYPERWORLD.
WE HOPE YOU ENJOY YOUR TIME HERE.

Game Features

  • Explore a vast, interconnected network of unique rooms and paths.
  • Meet interesting characters and make friends to follow you on your journey.
  • Collect charms with various effects to modify your moveset and abilities.
  • Solve mysteries and discover hidden secrets packed throughout the lore-rich world.
  • Immerse yourself in a unique 2.5D art style with original music and content created by just one person.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)

name: HYPERWORLD (Working Title)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: idk you're probably good

short_description: Far away, a strange world awaits you. Explore a vast network of rooms and paths, unlock new abilities, solve mysteries, make friends, discover secrets, and more in this retro-inspired 3D Platformer Metroidvania.
